resources.string: Less than 1 minute
%1$s today

Use Face unlock to unlock your device.

Keep in mind:
Looking at the phone can unlock it when you don’t intend to.

Your phone can be unlocked by someone else if it’s held up to your face while your eyes are open.

Your phone can be unlocked by someone who looks a lot like you, say, your child or an identical sibling.
Data recorded by face unlock will be permanently and securely deleted. After removal, you will need your PIN, pattern, or password to unlock your phone.
Turn on Adaptive Battery

"To extend battery life, Adaptive Battery limits battery for infrequently used apps. Your phone will learn how you use apps over time.
Notifications may be delayed for these apps."
Adaptive Battery
Use Adaptive Battery
Locate the fingerprint sensor on the front of your phone.
Locate the fingerprint sensor on the left side of your phone.
Locate the fingerprint sensor on the right side of your phone.
Locate the fingerprint sensor on the front of your device.
Locate the fingerprint sensor on the left side of your device.
Locate the fingerprint sensor on the right side of your device.
Locate the fingerprint sensor on the front of your tablet.
Locate the fingerprint sensor on the left side of your tablet.
Locate the fingerprint sensor on the right side of your tablet.
Enable on-screen nav bar
Enable on-screen navigation bar and disable hardware buttons
Prevent accidental wake-up
Check the proximity sensor prior to waking up screen
Screen refresh rate
Auto / Automatically raises the refresh rate from 60 to 90Hz for some content
60Hz / Refresh rate locked at 60Hz for all content
90Hz / Refresh rate locked at 90Hz for all content. Increased battery usage
Auto
Turn on the light when charging
High touch sensitivity
Increase touchscreen sensitivity so it can be used while wearing gloves
Touchscreen hovering
Allows you to hover the screen like a mouse in web browsers, remote desktops, etc
Saved Earbuds
